title: Handling Conflict with Kindness
itunes:summary:
What if I told you that a small act of kindness could diffuse an argument with your spouse? While it's not a guarantee, choosing kindness in the midst of a heated conversation can go a long way for your marriage, John asks the Smalley's about how choosing to be kind has helped their relationship. Featuring Leslie Vernick.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY
